V0000-1.question: Do you possess any vitals signs like for Pulse Apical?
V0000-1.instructions: if patient has any select reg otherwise select irreg

V0000-2.instructions: if patient has any select reg otherwise select irreg

V0000-3.question: Are you aware of vital temp value?
V0000-3.instructions: if patient is aware select value as true otherwise select false
